main event: Two unidentified aerial objects were sighted in Mineral Wells, Texas on 2 September 1954. The objects appeared as bright lights, changing color from white to red, and remained still for two minutes before moving rapidly. No discernible features or details were observed, and no sound was noted during the sighting.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and involved 2 unidentified objects, both of which appeared as bright lights and changed color from white to red.
The objects remained still for 2 minutes before moving rapidly, and there were no discernible features or details observed.
No tail or exhaust was noted from the objects, and no sound was reported during the sighting.
The observer estimated the angle of elevation of the objects at approximately 45 degrees, with an azimuth of approximately 35 degrees.
Weather conditions at the time of the sighting were reported as clear with no clouds and unlimited visibility.
result: Probably Balloon, Possibly Balloon, Was Aircraft, Possibly Aircraft, Insufficient Data for Evaluation
sighted object: Two unidentified aerial objects appearing as bright lights and changing color from white to red
photographs: No, the report indicates that photographs were available
